snippet: Facing an aggressive offensive from the Taliban, the government wants to expand the Afghan Local Police, despite their troubled history.
abstract: Afghan government is moving to rapidly expand Afghan Local Police, despite history of misconduct and human rights abuses, in effort to combat Taliban insurgents threatening many Afghan cities; expansion is evidence that United States main legacy in Afghanistan, creation of Afghan army and national police, is failing even before any final American military withdrawal.
